pages.title: Strip Logs
pages.text: After you stripped some logs, you'll get bark which is used to light a campfire early game.

pages.title: Campfire
pages.text: The campfire provides you with a heat source, a way to boil water bottles, to cook food & more.$(br2)Use bark to enlight it.

pages.title: Get more bottles
pages.text: If you reach Smithing Lvl 4 you can use the furnace which helps you a lot. E.g. more water bottles
